attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Uncontrolled experiments of Frankenstein crops will irreparably damage our environment for little or no significant advantage. Big business is not interested in the health of the public but is simply greedy for reckless profit. I therefore call 
on Her Majesty's government to prohibit the cultivation of GM crops.

rejection.details: Please replace the main sentence "No2GMcrops" with a clear action for HM Government
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
